title: CancerCure/AMC Cancer Fund Endowed Chair for Cancer Prevention and Control
description: To provide faculty support for a chair for the Cancer Prevention and Control Program for the recruitment and retention of a scientist and/or clinician specializing in translational research for the prevention and control of cancer.
marketingContent: To provide faculty support for a chair for the Cancer Prevention and Control Program for the recruitment and retention of a scientist and/or clinician specializing in translational research for the prevention and control of cancer.
